title: Fiora's Old Head on the New Splash
body: played with photoshop earlier. we need her old head back.

replies.body: vast improvement
Could crop a picture of a piece of shit and it would still be a vast improvement.
lol

It's almost like humans are distinguishable by their face and when you change it, they look different.

WHO KNEW?
Can we please make this happen?

/sigh ....I wish they wouldn't change her model. There is literally nothing wrong with the current one. It looks amazing. Work on taric or Warwick or Kass riot. THey need way more love than a champ who looks fine
I don't even play or care for Fiora but this needs to happen, please rito

just made one too, it looks like we have similar ideas lol
http://imgur.com/lityj4D
This will now be official Fiora splash art to me. Thank you!
I've been keeping out of the Fiora debate, but I like it.
Who knew editing a face onto a picture would make it look  better than Riot's artist's atrocious splash art
This is better than new splash, the old splash art was better. Sorry Riot some of the new splash arts sucks...

Omg yes. This is my Fiora.
@Ironstylus pleeeeaase
Its amazing how simple Riot could fix this and make people happy...i doubt they will though.
YASSSS!!!!!! Thats totally all she needs! :D
This doesn't look that bad... and I think I can agree on her hair looking odd... sigh, Artists are human too and make mistakes though, they forgot how iconic her hair was apparently
Someone should hire you to replace their art team. Would also save Riot and 10cent a lot of money, too.
99% of the other stuff they release is amazing. Let's not let one hiccup allow us to talk down their entire art team.
Hey look riot someone just made your splash art better for free using your old art but you won't change it because mother riot knows best right?

That looks incredibly good. 

Like wow seamless Photoshop work there.
Looks perfect, please listen to your community for once, Rito.

Logged in just to upvote.

But this is REALLY good. (Better than all the other tweaks imo because we still get old Fiora head).

So How long did this take you?
Because this is all Riot has to do to make us happy.
Good Job!
so much better i can't even describe it
sick af

If had to choose one:

* I would ask Fiora VU#1 on date (before forum cries).
* I would ditch Fiora VU#2 for #1 (after forum cries).
* I would **not** ask old Fiora out on a date.
Was that so hard Riot?
sexy.
This is great! nice job man
That looks simply amazing..
So much better.
thats actually really nice...unless they are going for a mongoloid man-dike deformity look, then i guess the new head is the way to go {{champion:32}}
I just don't like how the new face looks emaciated and the hair deriving too far from the original, but I am perfectly fine with the mid and lower body adjustments. 2/3 for the artist
Rito pls
all our fap folders are saved!!!!
so much better - please rito

Approved.

Rito: make it happen by end of week, or pack up your things.

Maybe because im a newer player and I'm not as attached or maybe because I have a different art style, but i actually didn't mind the more exaggerated facial feautures and stylized look. And I sorta of do understand why Riot might want to stylize more to set them apart from other games or maybe they just want to be more uniform (because honestly, look through all the champions; the art style and models themselves could be from a 100 different games; cmon, keep some consistency).
Now all we need is her hip flaps removed and those atrocious shoulder pads.

The whole community hates the new Fiora, but they know nothing! The artists at Riot, they are the only true wise men on earth. What they like is art. Their new Boards are superior to the old forums, their new HUD and minimap are obviously way better than the old one, their new splasharts are an absolute masterpiece and the thousands of people posting how awful it is are just ignorant plebs. The elite Riot artists are creating art far above our level to comprehend. We cannot appreciate the art they make for the game we play, but that's not their fault. They make true art, if we don't like it, go play some other game and spend your money elsewh... wait...

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfWvLVIn,comment-id=002f,timestamp=2015-07-24T21:25:21.054+0000)
>
> _The whole community hates the new Fiora,---_

Wrong.

i don't even like the rest of it.  there's nothing going on. 
and also : am I the only person getting absolutely sick of the "foreshorten this to the front left of the screen" thing they've been doing.  Like why is the tip of her blade, and the PETAL on her blade larger than her arm or any part of her face? 
Do not get me started on the new Veigar bullshit.

anyway. 
This is horribly done. the stairs behind her look cartoony and made of play-doh. ugh. riot.
We need her old _splash_ back. This looks a little better than the new one but the old head just feels really out of place.
Why do something complicated when we can do something easy ? Good job man
Someone went through here and literally downvoted every comment.
That's a really good photoshop!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
